txt.en: 'Interesting. There are no signs of the enemy in town, but something scared these people off.\n\n'I would like to know more.'
Empty
The quiet here is oppressive, as if not a breath stirs for leagues
This barn is empty; even the horses are gone
The occupants of this shelter left no trace of their whereabouts
The village of Dunfast is in the centre of the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should examine Dunfast for clues as to why it is empty.
This satchel has been abandoned in the middle of the floor
The village of Dunfast is in the centre of the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should examine Dunfast for clues as to why it is empty.
The lock has been broken right off this door, as if entry was forced
Cyneberg is at Dunfast.\n\nYou should tell Cyneberg what you found.
A mess was left here, as if belongings were hastily gathered
It is clear that supplies were gathered before this shelter was abandoned
This home is colder and draughtier than the others...
Apparently a violent scuffle broke out in this home

Return to Cyneberg
You and Cyneberg have come to the village of Dunfast, but it is empty....
'Here we are, and here is Dunfast... but where is everyone?\n\n'Let us have a look around. I can see no sign of, well... anything.'
